zh-CN.aboutPlatformContent: 深圳赛盈网络有限公司，是专注于为供应商及分销商双向赋能的跨境电商分销B2B平台，通过整合谷仓海外仓、云途专线物流、跨呗金融等优质供应链资源，帮助工厂及品牌供应商扩展海外销路；同时也为Amazon、eBay、Wish、Walmart及Shopify等平台的国内外卖家提供海外仓货源及代发服务，解决卖家遇到的选品难、资金有限、海外仓服务门槛高、售后难等系列经营难题，现已支持美国、英国、德国、法国、加拿大等国家分销。
zh-CN.normalMemberDescription: 新用户注册后，完善相关会员资料即可成为普通会员。若您还未完善，
zh-CN.vipDescription: 每月1号将根据会员在上一个月的销售额数据，对应普通会员至VIP1会员、VIP2会员、VIP3会员、VIP4会员、VIP5会员。会员等级调整将次月生效，无法提前申请生效。
zh-CN.upgradeDescription: 只有您上个月的有效订单销售额达到系统要求，才能享受对应等级的折扣。唯有多下订单才能提升您的会员等级进而享受更多的折扣。
zh-CN.upgradePolicyDescription: 会员升级可跨级，如果上一个月的销售额数据满足对应的升级额度，即可直接升级至对应的会员等级。
zh-CN.downgradePolicyDescription: 会员降级可跨级，如果上一个月的销售额数据未能满足当前等级所需的成长值，则直接降级至对应的会员等级。
zh-CN.directShippingDescription: 商品采用统一分销价格，均不享受赛盈会员权益折扣；产生于中国直发专区的商品订单销售额，均不纳入赛盈会员升级系统。
zh-CN.overseasWarehouseDescription: 部分海外仓商品不享受赛盈会员权益折扣，请在商品详情页"会员折扣"中查看。
zh-CN.apiIntegrationDescription: V3-V5的企业用户可联系业务经理申请权限
zh-CN.registrationCallToAction: 如何加入赛盈分销平台，开启海外一件代发模式?
zh-CN.registrationDescription: 点击下方按钮免费注册并完善会员资料以享受会员权益

en.aboutPlatformContent: Shenzhen Saleyee Network Co., Ltd. is a cross-border e-commerce B2B distribution platform focused on empowering both suppliers and distributors. By integrating high-quality supply chain resources such as Gucang overseas warehouses, Yuntu Logistics, and Kuabei Finance, we help factories and brand suppliers expand their overseas sales channels. We also provide overseas warehouse sourcing and drop-shipping services for domestic and international sellers on platforms such as Amazon, eBay, Wish, Walmart, and Shopify, solving operational challenges such as product selection difficulties, limited capital, high overseas warehouse service thresholds, and after-sales issues. We currently support distribution in the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, Canada, and other countries.
en.normalMemberDescription: New users can become normal members by completing their member profile after registration. If you haven't completed it yet,
en.vipDescription: On the 1st of each month, membership levels will be adjusted from normal member to VIP1, VIP2, VIP3, VIP4, or VIP5 based on the sales data from the previous month. Membership level adjustments will take effect the following month and cannot be applied for in advance.
en.upgradeDescription: Only when your effective order sales from last month reach the system requirements can you enjoy the discount of the corresponding level. Only by placing more orders can you upgrade your membership level and enjoy more discounts.
en.upgradePolicyDescription: Membership upgrades can skip levels. If last month's sales data meets the corresponding upgrade threshold, you can directly upgrade to the corresponding membership level.
en.downgradePolicyDescription: Membership downgrades can skip levels. If last month's sales data does not meet the growth value required for the current level, you will be directly downgraded to the corresponding membership level.
en.directShippingDescription: Products use a unified distribution price and do not enjoy Saleyee membership benefits discounts. Sales from orders in the China Direct Shipping Zone are not included in the Saleyee membership upgrade system.
en.overseasWarehouseDescription: Some overseas warehouse products do not enjoy Saleyee membership benefits discounts. Please check the "Member Discount" section on the product detail page.
en.platformOrderAuthDescription: Can be operated in the personal center
en.apiIntegrationDescription: Enterprise users of V3-V5 can contact their account manager to apply for permissions
en.registrationCallToAction: How to Join the Saleyee Distribution Platform and Start Overseas Dropshipping?
en.registrationDescription: Click the button below to register for free and complete your member profile to enjoy membership benefits
